translation.en: Go see what it is, quickly. Hand me the lantern.
translation.es: Ve a ver qué pasa, rápido. Pásame la lámpara.

translation.en: It's the captain! It's the captain!
-Help Jørgensen. His feet are frozen. -[man 2] Right, come on.
translation.es: Ayuden a Jörgensen. Tiene los pies congelados. Bien, vamos.

translation.en: -[man 3] Holm's on his way. -[man 1] Quick, Unger. Get the water.
translation.es: - Holm está en camino. - Date prisa, Unger. Trae el agua.

translation.en: -Unger, hurry up with the water. -It's coming!
translation.es: - Unger, apúrate con el agua. - ¡Ya va!

translation.en: -[man 4] Raise it. Easy. -[man 1] It's all right. We got you.
-We got you. -[man 4] Take it easy, Jørgensen.
[man 4] Hold these. Take it easy, Jørgensen.
-Do you have some whiskey? -[man 1] Yes. Get the man a drink.

translation.es: VÍSPERA DE NAVIDAD DE 1909 NORESTE DE GROENLANDIA

translation.en: -It's about time we found a use for you. -[laughter]
translation.es: - Por fin sirves para algo. - Gracias.

translation.en: [Ejnar] Gentlemen, can I have your attention?

translation.es: - Se acabó la fiesta. - Silencio, Poulsen.

translation.en: -I want you all to raise your glasses… -[crew] Of course.
translation.es: - Quiero que levanten sus copas… - Claro.
Por sus seres queridos en casa,

translation.en: to the men who gave their lives
translation.es: por los que dieron sus vidas

translation.en: exploring the last unknown parts of our kingdom.
translation.es: explorando las últimas partes desconocidas de nuestro reino.

translation.en: for joining me in fulfilling their mission.
translation.es: por acompañarme para cumplir su misión.

translation.en: Our long search didn't go quite as planned.
translation.es: Nuestra larga búsqueda no salió como habíamos planeado.

translation.en: it was hard to trace any signs of the vanished expedition.
translation.es: fue difícil encontrar rastros de la expedición desaparecida.

translation.en: A diary from one of the men.
translation.es: Un diario de uno de los hombres.

translation.en: where Mylius-Erichsen left his final records of the unknown land.
translation.es: donde Mylius-Erichsen dejó sus últimos registros de la tierra desconocida.

translation.en: A cairn's a stack of stones you can see from far away.
translation.es: Un montón de piedras que se ve desde lejos.

translation.en: So, therefore, I'll attempt another journey.
translation.es: Por lo tanto, intentaré hacer otro viaje.

translation.en: Well, this time further, across the ice cap,
translation.es: Esta vez más lejos, pasando la capa de hielo,

translation.en: to retrieve the findings they left behind.
translation.es: para recuperar los hallazgos que dejaron.

translation.en: This is why we're here, boys.
Without these findings, the North of Greenland could be lost,
translation.es: Sin esos hallazgos, los estadounidenses podrían quedarse

translation.en: and I can't do it alone,
which provides one of you lucky boys with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.es: lo cual le da a uno de ustedes una oportunidad única en la vida.

translation.en: I'll need a volunteer to accompany me.
translation.es: Necesito un voluntario que me acompañe.

translation.en: You're kidding, right? Jørgensen's feet were wrecked.
translation.es: - Bromeas, ¿verdad? - Jörgensen tenía los pies destrozados.

translation.en: [Poulsen] Aren't you next in line, Laub?
Shut up, Poulsen. Some of us have family.
Why don't any of you want to go with him?
translation.es: ¿Por qué nadie quiere ir con él?

translation.en: It's like walking from Moscow to Rome looking for a stack of stones.
translation.es: Es como caminar de Moscú a Roma buscando un montón de piedras.

translation.en: [Poulsen] Not to mention doing it with the captain.
He knew all about him before he came aboard, right?
translation.es: Sabía todo sobre él antes de subir a bordo, ¿no?

translation.en: I mean, I've read about him,
[scoffs] Not everyone's a fan, Iver Iversen.
translation.es: No todos lo admiran, Iver Iversen.

translation.en: -Not everyone can read. Right, Unger? -Try reading this!
translation.es: No todos saben leer. ¿Verdad, Unger? ¡Lee esto!

translation.en: I don't know how many volunteers you've had already--
[clears throat] What I'm trying to say is
technically, I'm out of a job.
As long as we're parked up here, the motor won't be needed.
translation.es: Mientras estemos parados, no se necesita el motor.

translation.en: I'd like to come with you, if you'd allow me.
translation.es: Me gustaría acompañarlo, si me lo permite.

translation.en: I'm good with a rifle, and I'm learning how to drive the dogs.
translation.es: Soy bueno con el rifle y estoy aprendiendo a llevar los perros.

translation.en: I'd really like to come, Captain.
I'll keep that in mind. Thank you, Iversen.
translation.es: Lo tendré en cuenta. Gracias, Iversen.

translation.en: -Looks like he needs a hand. -[Iver] Stay there.
All of you stay here, okay?
Here, let me give you a hand.
Iversen, the dogs work for you.
translation.es: Iversen, los perros trabajan para ti.

translation.en: each dog can pull a hundred pounds of weight from the start.
translation.es: cada perro puede halar 45 kilos desde el principio.

translation.en: Once that hundred pounds has been eaten,
translation.es: Una vez que se han comido esos 45 kilos,

translation.en: well, that dog becomes surplus to requirement.
translation.es: ese perro se convierte en un excedente.

translation.en: So we shoot the worst dog,
translation.es: Así que matamos el peor perro
y con él alimentamos a los demás.

translation.en: So, Iversen, don't become best friends.
translation.es: Así que no los conviertas en tus mejores amigos.

translation.en: -[Laub] I have, sir. -What are your thoughts on him?
Have you seen him with the dogs?
Clearly he needs to work a bit harder to improve.
But you think he can do it?
[Unger] Don't be ridiculous. Surely that's too heavy.
translation.es: No seas ridículo. Seguro que pesa demasiado.
Se han gastado un millón de dólares.

translation.en: It's got combination turbines and reciprocating engines
translation.es: Tiene turbinas combinadas y motores alternativos

translation.en: guaranteed to maintain a speed of 21 knots.
translation.es: que garantizan una velocidad constante de 21 nudos.

translation.en: -Translation, anyone, please? -[man 1] What are you talking about?
[Laub] Is the Alabama not up to your standard?
translation.es: ¿El Alabama no está a tu altura?

translation.en: Go on about this with the captain, he'll put a bullet in your head.
translation.es: Háblale así al capitán, y te pega un tiro en la cabeza.

translation.en: Yeah, usually I'd say Poulsen's talking shit,
translation.es: Normalmente diría que Poulsen habla mierda,

translation.en: but I've gotta agree, I daren't say two words to him.
translation.es: pero estoy de acuerdo, no me atrevo a decirle nada.
El capitán no es tan malo.

translation.en: I have to say, Iver, I think you've lost your mind.
translation.es: Iver, creo que te volviste loco.

translation.en: What do you know about sledging, surviving on the ice when it's 40 below?
translation.es: ¿Qué sabes de conducir trineos y sobrevivir a 40 grados bajo cero?

translation.en: Yeah, and polar bears and all that other scary shit out there.
translation.es: Y de osos polares y toda la mierda tan aterradora que hay.

translation.en: I think Iver has got quite the handle on those dogs now.
translation.es: Creo que Iver ya sabe manejar a los perros.

translation.en: It's not too late to change your mind.
This is my third trip up here and I still hate those fucking dogs.
translation.es: Este es mi tercer viaje aquí y sigo odiando a esos putos perros.

translation.en: If they were any more inbred, they'd be sandwiches.
translation.es: Un poco más cruzados y les salen tres ojos.

translation.en: Once you learn to trust your lead dog, it kind of falls into place.
translation.es: Una vez que aprendes a confiar en tu perro guía, todo encaja.

translation.en: Mine's Bjørn. He keeps the others in check.
translation.es: El mío es Bjørn. Él controla a los demás.

translation.en: Check out Iver and his new favorite dog, Bjørn!
translation.es: ¡Miren a Iver y a su nuevo perro favorito, Bjørn!

translation.en: I feel like I've let you down.
You need to get yourself right.
He wouldn't even be on this trip if our engine hadn't failed in Reykjavik.
translation.es: No habría venido si el motor no se hubiera averiado en Reikiavik.

translation.en: Just look after Alabama for me.
translation.es: Tú solo cuida al Alabama por mí.

translation.en: You're not a young man anymore.
You're risking your life, Iversen's life.
translation.es: Estás arriesgando tu vida, la vida de Iversen.

translation.en: You want us to give up without trying?

translation.es: - Hicimos lo que pudimos. - Qué tontería.

translation.en: Do you expect her to wait for you?
-You've got nothing to prove. -This is not about me.
translation.es: - No tienes que probar nada. - No se trata de mí.
Las instrucciones del comité fueron claras.

translation.en: The sea opens up by July.
translation.es: El mar se descongela en julio.

translation.en: If we're not back by August before the sea freezes, then you go.
translation.es: Si no hemos vuelto en agosto antes de que se congele, te vas.

translation.en: -You'll basically be on your own. -That's an order.
translation.es: - Estarás prácticamente solo. - Es una orden.

translation.en: Iversen is the best, if not the only, man willing to make the trip.
translation.es: Iversen es el mejor, si no el único dispuesto a hacer el viaje.

translation.en: I respect your concern, but we are leaving tomorrow.
translation.es: Respeto tu preocupación, pero mañana salimos.

translation.en: [Laub] Iver, stand closer to the captain.
-[Poulsen] You too, Captain. -[Unger] All the best.
-Are we gonna try and get up there? -Well, there's always a way up.
translation.es: - ¿Vamos a intentar subir? - Siempre hay una forma de subir.

translation.en: It's just finding the quickest route.
translation.es: Solo hay que buscar la ruta más rápida.

translation.en: I bet there's a quick way down too.
translation.es: Apuesto a que también se baja rápido.

translation.en: Mm, which is why I need you to concentrate at all times.
translation.es: Por eso necesito que siempre estés concentrado.

translation.en: We need to get up to get across.
It's like we've landed on the moon.
translation.es: Parece que aterrizamos en la luna.

translation.en: How many cubic meters of ice do you think this is?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos metros cúbicos de hielo cree que tenga esto?

translation.en: Must be at least two million, do you think?
translation.es: Deben ser al menos dos millones, ¿no?

translation.en: I need you to watch where you're walking.
translation.es: Solo necesito que mires por dónde caminas.

translation.en: [Iver] I'm reading this article you wrote about the Denmark Expedition.
translation.es: Estoy leyendo un artículo que escribió sobre la expedición Dinamarca.

translation.en: Now I'm here with you, reading your story.
translation.es: Estoy aquí con usted, leyendo su historia.

translation.en: They had so much equipment, didn't they? They even had an automobile.
translation.es: Tenían muchos equipos, ¿no? Hasta tenían un auto.

translation.en: Imagine that! Driving across the ice.
What type do you think it was, Captain? Crossley?
translation.es: ¿Qué marca cree que era, capitán? ¿Un Crossley?

translation.en: What horsepower was the engine? Can you remember?
Was it four to eight perhaps?
Captain, that's my lead dog, Bjørn.
translation.es: Capitán, ese es mi perro líder, Bjørn.

translation.en: I think he'd like to come in the tent. Would that be okay?
translation.es: Creo que quiere entrar a la tienda. ¿Le parece bien?

translation.en: Little wonder they got lost out here.
translation.es: No me extraña que se hayan perdido aquí.

translation.en: what do you think really happened
Sometimes, it's best not to think too much.
translation.es: A veces es mejor no pensar demasiado.

translation.en: But he never knew when to give up.
The two others were lost in the ice.
translation.es: Los otros dos se perdieron en el hielo.

translation.en: [Ejnar] His final words in the diary and the map were all that survived.
translation.es: Solo sobrevivieron sus últimas palabras en el diario y el mapa.

translation.en: You never think you can't make it.
translation.es: Uno nunca piensa que no va a sobrevivir.

translation.en: You always believe there'll be a way.
translation.es: Uno siempre cree que habrá una manera.

translation.en: Captain told us we can't have you in if you make noise.
translation.es: El capitán nos dijo que no puedes entrar si haces ruido.

translation.en: Captain, I've just put that on.
Well, let me show you something.
In Alaska, they do this in these conditions to go fast.
translation.es: En Alaska hacen esto cuando quieren ir rápido.

translation.en: Just a thin layer of ice.
translation.es: Solo una capa fina de hielo.

translation.en: -See the cirrus clouds up in the north? -No, Captain.
translation.es: - ¿Ves los cirros en el norte? - No, capitán.

translation.en: The dogs are smelling land! Slow down!
I can see him! It's Bjørn.
Get up! We'll pull the sledge up.
I've lost us two weeks' worth of dog food,
translation.es: perdí dos semanas de comida para perros,

translation.en: I've lost us half our tea and one can of paraffin.
translation.es: la mitad del té y una lata de parafina.

translation.en: -And Bjørn, Captain. -It's just a dog, Iversen.
translation.es: - Y a Bjørn, capitán. - Solo es un perro, Iversen.

translation.en: Bringing you with me was always a risk,
translation.es: Sabía que era un riesgo traerte,

translation.en: but I judged your Navy background would arm you with the necessary discipline
translation.es: pero pensé que por tu experiencia en la Armada tendrías la disciplina necesaria para seguir órdenes.
tendrías la disciplina necesaria para seguir órdenes.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, at least tomorrow, we'll be off the ice cap.
translation.es: Menos mal mañana saldremos de la capa de hielo.

translation.en: can I ask you a personal question?
out here, in places like this?
Don't you have someone special at home waiting for you?

translation.es: hay que viajar con poco equipaje.

translation.en: You can't have your mind some 2,000 miles away.
translation.es: No puedes tener la cabeza a 3000 kilómetros de distancia.

translation.en: So, why do you do this?
Why does anyone do anything? Why are you a mechanic?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se hacen las cosas? ¿Por qué eres mecánico?

translation.en: It's all I was good at, fixing engines.
What did they tell you back when you joined us in Reykjavik?
translation.es: ¿Qué te dijeron cuando te nos uniste en Reikiavik?

translation.en: Well, I know it's to do with the Americans
translation.es: Sé que tiene que ver con los estadounidenses

translation.en: and their claim of some land.
I was just excited to go on a trip to Greenland with you
translation.es: solo quería viajar a Groenlandia con usted
y unirme a una expedición de verdad.

translation.en: that the top of Greenland is separated by a channel
translation.es: que el norte de Groenlandia está separado por un canal

translation.en: from the rest of the country,
but no one's proved it yet.
Might even make you famous, Iversen.
Me, famous? I doubt the ladies would be queuing up for me.
translation.es: ¿Famoso yo? Dudo que las mujeres se vayan a pelear por mí.

translation.en: Well, don't get ahead of yourself.
First, we have to find the bloody thing.
-I call her Miss Affection. -You named her?
translation.es: - La llamo señorita Afecto. - ¿Le pusiste nombre?

translation.en: -Miss Affection. -What sort of name is that?
translation.es: - Señorita Afecto. - ¿Qué clase de nombre es ese?

translation.en: -[Ejnar] What about this one? -The small, smiley one?
-She'd laugh at my jokes. -She'd laugh at the stupid name.
translation.es: - Se reiría de mis chistes. - Se reiría de ese nombre tan tonto.

translation.en: Is there one that catches your eye, Captain?
[Ejnar] I rather like this one. Has she got a name?
[Ejnar] I'm going to call her Naja.
Unless any man here should know of any impediment,
translation.es: A menos que algún presente conozca algún impedimento,

translation.en: you and Naja shall be together from this day on.
translation.es: usted y Naja estarán juntos a partir de hoy.

translation.en: No life here. I didn't even see a bird.
translation.es: Aquí no hay vida. No vi ni un pájaro.
No hay comida para los perros.

translation.en: -I've not done anything. -You must've done something.
translation.es: - No he hecho nada. - Debes haber hecho algo.

translation.en: It's not working anymore. Are you a complete idiot?
translation.es: Ya no funciona. ¿Eres un completo idiota?
- Sin esto estamos jodidos. - Capitán, yo…

translation.en: Without the Primus, we're as good as dead, understand?
-You do understand that? -Can you pass the kettle, Captain?
We'll have to go half ration from now on.
translation.es: De ahora en adelante, medias raciones.

translation.en: Now, we have a slight course correction we need to make.
translation.es: Tenemos que hacer una ligera corrección del rumbo.

translation.en: Is there a point where perhaps we…
We have a map. We will find it.
We won't find it by standing around talking.
And we will be back on the Alabama by August.
translation.es: Estaremos de vuelta en el Alabama en agosto.

translation.en: We're going down to one sledge.
translation.es: Vamos a reducir todo a un trineo.
- Y sopa de rabo de toro, mire. - Espera.

translation.en: "Being without food for ourselves and our dogs,
translation.es: "Al no tener más comida para nosotros y los perros,

translation.en: we must leave this place and try to make our way to coastal areas with game,
translation.es: debemos irnos e intentar llegar a las zonas costeras donde haya caza

translation.en: enough to sledge the 580 miles back to the ship."
translation.es: suficiente para recorrer los 930 km de regreso al barco".

translation.en: They had no food, Captain, but they left this.
translation.es: No tenían comida, capitán, pero dejaron esto.

translation.en: "We discovered and leave a proof in this cairn
translation.es: "Descubrimos que el canal de Peary no existe

translation.en: that Peary Channel does not exist."
translation.es: y dejamos una prueba en este mojón".

translation.en: "Navy Cliff is joined by land to Heilprin Land,
translation.es: "El acantilado Navy está unido a la tierra de Heilprin,

translation.en: therefore our work is almost done."
translation.es: por lo que nuestro trabajo está casi terminado".

translation.en: "We hope to reach the ship before the end of September, with or without dogs."
translation.es: "Esperamos llegar al barco antes de terminar septiembre, con o sin perros".

translation.en: leader of Denmark Expedition to Northeast Greenland."
translation.es: líder de la expedición Dinamarca al noreste de Groenlandia".

translation.en: Robert Peary and the Americans were wrong.
translation.es: Robert Peary y los estadounidenses estaban equivocados.

translation.en: I don't really understand why what we found is so important,
translation.es: No entiendo bien por qué es tan importante lo que encontramos,

translation.en: but seeing you smile, Captain, seeing you laugh…
translation.es: pero verlo sonreír, capitán, verlo reír…

translation.en: The USA has no claim here.
translation.es: Estados Unidos no puede reclamar nada.

translation.en: Denmark will thank you one day, Iver Iversen.
translation.es: Dinamarca te lo agradecerá algún día, Iver Iversen.

translation.en: It's time to celebrate. Now you put that soup on.
translation.es: Es hora de celebrar. Pon a calentar esa sopa.

translation.en: We can go home now, Iversen.
translation.es: Ya podemos volver a casa, Iversen.

translation.en: Like walking from Rome to Moscow looking for a stack of stones.
translation.es: Es como caminar de Roma a Moscú buscando un montón de piedras.

translation.en: That's what the guys were saying on the ship.
translation.es: Eso decían los chicos en el barco.

translation.en: Well, you can put them straight now.
translation.es: Ya puedes ponerlos en su sitio.

translation.en: Do you think we could eat the liver?
The rest is skin and bone.
translation.es: El resto es piel y huesos.

translation.en: about a silver spoon in a pot with anything poisonous?
translation.es: de una cuchara de plata en una olla con algo tóxico?

translation.en: Shame we don't have any silver.
translation.es: Lástima que no tengamos nada de plata.

translation.en: You said you didn't have anyone back home.
translation.es: Dijo que no tenía a nadie.

translation.en: -I don't remember. -No, I don't remember either.
translation.es: - No me acuerdo. - No, yo tampoco.

translation.en: -That's… not green. -That's more brown than green.
translation.es: - Eso no es verde. - Es más café que verde.

translation.en: I can't believe this was the only thing that got torn.
translation.es: No puedo creer que esto fue lo único que se rompió.

translation.en: [sighs] They're different, aren't they? Their voices, their smell.
translation.es: Son diferentes, ¿no? Sus voces, su olor.

translation.en: I remember when I was 16, about to join the Navy,
translation.es: Cuando tenía 16 años, a punto de alistarme en la Armada,

translation.en: my grandfather asked if I'd go with him to Copenhagen Harbor.
translation.es: mi abuelo me dijo que lo acompañara al puerto de Copenhague.

translation.en: I thought we were going to look at ships, so I went along,
translation.es: Pensé que íbamos a ver barcos, así que fui.

translation.en: even packing a lunch for the two of us,
translation.es: Hasta llevé almuerzo para los dos.

translation.en: He wanted to make sure I was ready to set sail
translation.es: Quería asegurarse de que yo estuviera listo para zarpar

translation.en: and, in his words, "be a man."
translation.es: y según él, "para ser un hombre".

translation.en: So he took me to the red-light district
translation.es: Me llevó a la zona de tolerancia

translation.en: make sure I wasn't embarrassed on my travels.
translation.es: para que no me avergonzara en mis viajes.

translation.en: [chuckles] I just went along with it.
Ended up with this older woman.
she did expand my knowledge greatly.
my dad took me to the hospital,
translation.es: mi papá me llevó al hospital,
a la sala de enfermedades venéreas,

translation.en: to show me the dire consequences of such behavior.
translation.es: para mostrarme las terribles consecuencias de ese comportamiento.

translation.en: We have to travel light if we're gonna make it.
translation.es: Para sobrevivir debemos viajar con poco equipaje.

translation.en: We'll leave everything that's not absolutely vital.
translation.es: Dejaremos todo lo que no sea absolutamente vital.

translation.en: There's another 200 miles to the ship.
-Why can't we go around? -We won't have time.
We need to build a cairn.
You don't think we can make it, do you?
If we don't, we lose everything.
translation.es: Si no lo hacemos, perdemos todo.

translation.en: [Ejnar] At least if the proof and our journals are kept here in a cairn,
translation.es: Al menos si las pruebas y nuestros diarios quedan aquí en un mojón,

translation.en: This is what happened to Mylius-Erichsen, isn't it?
translation.es: Esto fue lo que le pasó a Mylius-Erichsen, ¿no?

translation.en: I just need to lie down for a second.
[Iver] Sound the bell! -[Ejnar laughs] -Sound the bell!
They've built a hut with parts of the ship.
translation.es: Construyeron una cabaña con partes del barco.

translation.en: No, they've left us! They've left us!
The Alabama was wrecked, crushed by the ice.
translation.es: El Alabama estaba destrozado, aplastado por el hielo.

translation.en: We had to leave when we had the chance.
translation.es: Tuvimos que irnos cuando tuvimos la oportunidad.

translation.en: We left enough food to last at least a year.
translation.es: Dejamos comida para al menos un año.

translation.en: -[official] Let's pray they make it back. -They want more than prayers.
translation.es: - Recemos para que los hombres regresen. - Quieren más que oraciones.

translation.en: You're asking the government to fund another rescue attempt. Is that correct?
translation.es: Le pide al gobierno que financie otro intento de rescate. ¿Correcto?

translation.en: Lieutenant Laub, it's not your first visit to the Arctic, is it?
translation.es: Teniente Laub, no es su primer viaje al Ártico, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No, sir. It was my fourth.
translation.es: No, señor. Era mi cuarto viaje.

translation.en: And who is this man, Iver Iversen?
His name is not on the original crew list.
translation.es: No está en la lista original de la tripulación.

translation.en: [official] No. He joined Alabama in Reykjavik.
translation.es: No. Se unió al Alabama en Reikiavik.

translation.en: And how come a mechanic is chosen to accompany Mikkelsen
translation.es: ¿Y por qué eligieron a un mecánico para acompañar a Mikkelsen
en el segundo viaje en trineo?

translation.en: Did he have any experience as an Arctic explorer?
This was his first time in the Arctic.
translation.es: Era su primera vez en el Ártico.

translation.en: So, three dead men the first time around and now two more on the rescue attempt.
translation.es: Tres hombres muertos la primera vez y ahora dos más en el intento de rescate.

translation.en: Sir, there's no proof that they're--
translation.es: Bueno, señor, no hay pruebas de que…

translation.en: Now, you two both knew that the chances of success were minimal.
translation.es: Ustedes dos sabían que había pocas probabilidades de éxito.

translation.en: Even less so when you allow an inexperienced greenhorn
translation.es: Menos aún cuando dejan que un novato sin experiencia

translation.en: to volunteer for an early death.
translation.es: se ofrezca para una muerte prematura.

translation.en: I can't possibly justify more expense on another fruitless mission.
translation.es: No puedo justificar más gastos en otra misión inútil.

translation.en: Minister, nobody wants to waste government funds.
translation.es: Ministro, nadie quiere desperdiciar fondos del gobierno.

translation.en: We were rescued by a whaler.
Perhaps if we can put up a reward.

translation.es: - No puedo creer que nos hayan dejado. - Exactamente.

translation.en: They got picked up by a passing ship.
translation.es: Los recogió un barco que pasaba.

translation.en: The same will happen to us.
translation.es: Lo mismo nos pasará a nosotros.
Al final del verano del próximo año

translation.en: Imagine if they could see us now.
What would you do if a girl suddenly came walking towards us
translation.es: ¿Qué haría si de repente viniera una chica caminando

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, that's not gonna happen. No, but if it did?
translation.es: - Eso no va a pasar. - No, pero ¿si pasara?
Tal vez en un globo aerostático.

translation.en: -Is that the guy that went missing? -Yeah. I met him once.
translation.es: - ¿Ese es el tipo que desapareció? - Sí. Lo conocí.

translation.en: I walked all the way from Copenhagen to Gothenburg to see him.
translation.es: Caminé desde Copenhague hasta Gotemburgo para verlo.

translation.en: He was gonna fly his hot-air balloon to the North Pole.
translation.es: Iba a volar su globo aerostático al Polo Norte.

translation.en: I wanted to join his expedition.
[sarcastic] Bet he was thrilled to meet a 15-year-old you!
translation.es: Seguro que él quedó encantado de conocerlo.

translation.en: He explained to me that I was too young,
translation.es: Me explicó que era demasiado joven,

translation.en: but then he paid for me to catch the train back to Copenhagen.
translation.es: pero me dio dinero para tomar el tren de regreso a Copenhague.

translation.en: To get the journals and the proof.
translation.es: Para traer los diarios y las pruebas.

translation.en: -We should never have left it. -Right now?
We need to get back here for when the sea opens up again.
translation.es: Debemos volver aquí para cuando el mar se descongele.

translation.en: -Do you think we should leave a note? -No, Iver.
translation.es: - ¿No deberíamos dejar una nota? - No, Iver.

translation.en: As I told you, we'll be back before the ice breaks.
translation.es: Como dije, volveremos antes de que se rompa el hielo.

translation.en: Yeah, but it's 200 miles there and 200 miles back.
translation.es: Sí, pero son 320 kilómetros de ida y 320 de regreso.

translation.en: For the love of God, can we just get going?
translation.es: Por el amor de Dios, ¿podemos irnos?

translation.en: They say there's truth in every dream.
translation.es: Dicen que en cada sueño hay algo de verdad.

translation.en: Well, I hope for your sake there's no truth in my dreams.
translation.es: Por su bien, espero en mis sueños no haya nada de verdad.

translation.en: I mean, I really couldn't go back.
"Oh, sorry, sir. It got eaten by a bear."
translation.es: "Lo siento, señor. Se lo comió un oso".

translation.en: What do you think did this?
They say there's truth in every dream, Iversen.
translation.es: Dicen que en cada sueño hay algo de verdad, Iversen.

translation.en: They say there's truth in every dream.
translation.es: Dicen que en cada sueño hay algo de verdad.

translation.en: Is that it, Captain? Is that…
Is that the car… from the Denmark Expedition?
translation.es: ¿Ese es el auto? ¿De la expedición Dinamarca?

translation.en: I'm just saying it could've been worse. Could've been worse.
translation.es: Solo digo que pudo haber sido peor.
- Si hubiéramos… - No te hagas el listo, Iver.

translation.en: I know what you want to say.
Yes, we should've left a fucking note!
translation.es: Sí, debimos haber dejado una maldita nota.

translation.en: [Jørgensen] Minister, when the sailor found the hut, it was boarded up.
translation.es: Ministro, cuando el marinero encontró la cabaña, estaba sellada.

translation.en: We never left it like that. Someone's been there.
translation.es: No la dejamos así. Alguien estuvo ahí.

translation.en: Do you mind if we walk and talk?
-I know you're a very busy man. -Busy?
translation.es: - Sé que es un hombre ocupado. - ¿Ocupado?

translation.en: Thank you. The whole nation seems to be rattling a begging bowl.
translation.es: Gracias. Parece que todo el país me pide dinero.

translation.en: Then there's this Greenland issue where we have to convince our own people
translation.es: Y está el asunto de Groenlandia. Debemos convencer a nuestra propia gente

translation.en: that it's financially viable to maintain these wretched colonies,
translation.es: de que aún es económicamente viable mantener esas colonias,

translation.en: whilst trying to persuade the rest of the world
translation.es: mientras convencemos al resto del mundo

translation.en: that we still have some semblance of control.
translation.es: de que aún tenemos algo de control.
En fin, este asunto del rescate de Mikkelsen.

translation.en: We appreciate and understand the importance of the work he undertook,
translation.es: Apreciamos y entendemos la importancia de su trabajo,

translation.en: Sticking their little flags in the ice all over the place
translation.es: Clavan sus banderitas por todo el hielo

translation.en: and this bloody Peary chap claiming the North Pole.
translation.es: y el maldito de Peary reclama el Polo Norte.

translation.en: We can't have that. It's ridiculous.
translation.es: No podemos permitir eso. Es absurdo.

translation.en: I'm confident that the captain secured the evidence.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que el capitán aseguró la evidencia.

translation.en: But you don't know that, do you?
Nor do you know where in this vast country we should send a rescue mission.
translation.es: Ni sabe a qué parte de ese gran territorio debemos enviar una misión de rescate.

translation.en: -I know this is difficult for you to bear. -They won't survive another year.
translation.es: - Sé que es difícil para usted. - No sobrevivirán un año más.

translation.en: If we don't get a ship there before the ice freezes next summer,
translation.es: Si no enviamos un barco antes de que el hielo se congele en el verano,

translation.en: not only do we give up on them, but we also give up on Greenland.
translation.es: no solo renunciaremos a ellos, también renunciaremos a Groenlandia.

translation.en: We have already offered a very generous reward.
translation.es: Ya ofrecimos una recompensa muy generosa.

translation.en: More than that, I cannot do.
-But would you, Captain? -Honestly, Iver, I don't know.
translation.es: - Pero ¿lo haría, capitán? - Sinceramente, no lo sé.

translation.en: Actually, can we just leave it?
This is our first Christmas here, in the hut?
translation.es: ¿Es nuestra primera Navidad aquí en la cabaña?
Sí, la segunda en la cabaña.
- Feliz Navidad, Iver. - Feliz Navidad, capitán.

translation.en: I'll tell you something that I know for certain.
It's that whilst you still had your hands, I couldn't…
translation.es: es de que mientras tuviera manos, yo no podría…

translation.en: Or at the very least fingers.
I don't like talking about it or thinking about it,
translation.es: No me gusta hablar de eso o pensarlo,

translation.en: but for me, it's hands that distinguish humans from animals.
translation.es: pero creo que las manos son las que distinguen a humanos de animales.

translation.en: It's with our hands we can do all the things that animals can't do.
translation.es: Con las manos hacemos todo lo que los animales no pueden hacer.

translation.en: So if my hands were removed before I die?
translation.es: ¿Si me quitaran las manos antes de morir?

translation.en: Yeah, then… Yeah, I could quite happily eat you.
translation.es: Sí, entonces me lo comería con gusto.

translation.en: I just missed you so much.
Captain, it's getting cold out here. Come back inside.
The ice isn't completely impassable yet, is it?
translation.es: El hielo todavía no está infranqueable, ¿verdad?
Voy a buscar de todos modos.

translation.en: I think he's taken it hard.
We need to keep an eye on him,
make sure things don't get too much.
translation.es: Para que las cosas no se salgan de control.

translation.en: Do you believe in ghosts, Captain? Ghosts?

translation.es: Hace un rato vi a mi abuelo.

translation.en: No. Just up on the hill.
Wh-what do you mean you met him?
You sensed him? You felt his presence?
I think he may have passed away
It doesn't necessarily mean he's dead.
translation.es: Eso no significa que esté muerto.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm… I'm really sorry.
-If there's anything I can, you know-- -I know.
translation.es: - Si hay algo que pueda… - Lo sé.

translation.en: [Naja] What if you never come home?
-We were going to get married. -I didn't have an option.
translation.es: - Nos íbamos a casar. - No tenía alternativa.

translation.en: -I couldn't see another way. -Someone else could do this. Why you?
translation.es: - No veía otra salida. - Alguien más podía hacerlo. ¿Por qué tú?

translation.en: No one else could have done this.
translation.es: Nadie más podría haber hecho esto.

translation.en: I don't know why it had to be me, but it did. It was always going to be me.
translation.es: No sé por qué tenía que ser yo, pero así fue. Siempre iba a ser yo.

translation.en: What about Iver? Did he have a choice?
He volunteered. He knew the dangers.
You do know that no one is coming to get you?
translation.es: Sabes que nadie vendrá a buscarte.
- No seas tonto. Déjame ver. - No.

translation.en: Get out. Get out! Get out!
How's the, um, neck holding up?
I almost feel guilty about it.

translation.es: Sé que la eligió a ella,

translation.en: but I guess last night, she decided to pick me,
translation.es: pero anoche ella decidió elegirme a mí.

translation.en: if you know what I mean.
Did you see the tracks outside?
I'll go and have a look. Might be a rabbit or something.
translation.es: Iré a ver. Podría ser un conejo o algo así.

translation.en: [Ejnar] You took her! You took her! You took her!
-Captain, put it down. -[Naja] Don't do this!
-Calm down. -[Naja] Don't do this. It's not real.
translation.es: Cálmese. No lo hagas. No es real.

translation.en: -Don't do this! -[Iver] Put the gun down.
-[Naja] Stop! -It's not real! -Put it down. -Put it down!
translation.es: - ¡Ejnar, basta! ¡Baja el arma! - No es real. ¡Bájela!

translation.en: How much food do we have left?
One chance. One shot. Don't miss.
translation.es: Una oportunidad. Un disparo. No falles.

translation.en: [Neergaard] What is the single most important task for an explorer?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la tarea más importante para un explorador?

translation.en: When you travel into unknown lands to discover new parts of the globe,
translation.es: Cuando viaja a tierras desconocidas para descubrir nuevas partes del mundo,

translation.en: it is to ensure the records of your discoveries
translation.es: es para asegurarse de que los registros de sus hallazgos

translation.en: are delivered back safe and sound,
Otherwise, it is all in vain.
translation.es: De lo contrario, todo es en vano.

translation.en: The blood, sweat and tears would all be for nothing.
translation.es: La sangre, el sudor y las lágrimas no habrán servido de nada.

translation.en: Unlike the honorable members of the Danish press,
translation.es: A diferencia de los honorables miembros de la prensa danesa,

translation.en: we in the Danish government never doubted for a second
translation.es: en el gobierno danés nunca dudamos ni por un segundo

translation.en: that Captain Mikkelsen would return home safe and sound.
translation.es: que el capitán Mikkelsen regresaría sano y salvo.

translation.en: We played our part in ensuring the safe return of a Danish hero.
translation.es: Trabajamos para asegurar el regreso seguro de un héroe danés.

translation.en: I wouldn't be standing here if it wasn't for you.
translation.es: No estaría aquí si no fuera por ti.

translation.en: "Based on the findings brought back by Captain Ejnar Mikkelsen,
translation.es: "Con base en los hallazgos que trajo el capitán Ejnar Mikkelsen,

translation.en: that Peary Land is not an island,
translation.es: que la tierra de Peary no es una isla,

translation.en: -[Neergaard] It gives me great pleasure… -Congratulations, gentlemen.
translation.es: Es un placer para mí… Felicitaciones, caballeros.

translation.en: …to be the first person to welcome home
translation.es: …ser el primero en darles la bienvenida

translation.en: the men who made the impossible possible.
translation.es: a los hombres que hicieron posible lo imposible.

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss… -Holm.
It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss Holm.
translation.es: Es un placer conocerla, señorita Holm.

translation.en: [chuckles] They have returned, I promise you!
